sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
General Assembly Appointments Act.

sections.heading: If any law requires the appointment of members of the General
sections.text:
Assembly to any commission, committee, board, council or similar body, all
appointments thereto, whether of such members or of other persons, must be
made in writing by the appointing authority designated by law and filed
with the Secretary of State as a public record.
